acute_aquatic_toxicity.hazard_name: Hazardous to the aquatic environment Acute
acute_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: It was classified into Category 1 from 48-hour EC50=0.07mg/L of Crustacea (Daphnia magna) (SIDS, 2004).

acute_toxicity_inhalation_dust.hazard_name: Acute toxicity Inhalation: Dusts and mists
acute_toxicity_inhalation_dust.rationale: Not classified because of "SPECIES: Rat; ENDPOINT: LC50>19.0mg/L" (SIDS,2002)

acute_toxicity_oral.rationale:
SPECIES: Rat
ENDPOINT: LD50
VALUE: 7710 mg/kg
REFERENCE SOURCE: SIDS (2002)

carcinogenicity.rationale: Since it had classified into the class 3 according to IARC, it carried out the outside of Category.

chronic_aquatic_toxicity.hazard_name: Hazardous to the aquatic environment Long-term
chronic_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: Since rapidly degrading (BOD: 84% (existing chemical safety inspections data)), and less bio-accumulative (log Kow=3.46 (PHYSPROP Database, 2005)).

corrosive_to_metals.rationale: Test methods applicable to solid substances are not available.

flammable_gases.hazard_name: Flammable gases including chemically unstable gases

flammable_solids.rationale: Not classified because of UNRTDG Class5.2(UN No.3102, 3104, 3106, 3107, 3108, 3109)

germ_cell_mutagenicity.rationale: Since it gave negative (SIDS, 2002) in the dominant lethality tests by mice and micronucleus tests using the mouse erythrocytes, we classified it as Out Of Category.

organic_peroxides.classification: Type B, Type C, Type D, Type E, Type F
organic_peroxides.hazard_statement: Heating may cause a fire or explosion
organic_peroxides.rationale: It is subdivided to type B to F depending on the content in products or etc. (Refer to the paragraph of the UNRTDG)

oxidizing_solids.rationale: Organic compounds containing oxygen and the oxygen is chemically bonded only to carbon (but not to other elements).

reproductive_toxicity.rationale:
It is observed that reduction of the weight and degenerative effects of male rats genitalia. 
These should be considered as organ damage, of general toxicity caused in repeated administration in extensive dose (1000mg/kg/day), occured in the male genitalia, and no change has been observed in the items related to reproductive toxicity (mating rate and pregnancy rate in female rats). 
Moreover, although there are cases of high birth rate of runts  and significant reduction in weight gain of offsprings under condition of no maternal toxicity (SIDS,2002), their toxicological significance would be low. 
Therefore, it was placed out of classification.

respiratory_sensitizer.rationale: Since we have no data, we could not classify.

self_heating_substances.rationale: Since the melting points are 103 degC - 105 degC (ICSCJ, 2002) and 140 degC or less, the test specified by GHS is inapplicable.

serious_eye_damage_irritation.rationale: The irritation is acknowledged in rabbits 24,48 and 72 hours after the exposures (SIDS, (2002), however the degree of irritation differs depending on the tests or the test methods. Therefore, it was set as Category 2A-2B.

skin_corrosion_irritation.rationale: There is data of "slight irritation" or "having no irritation" and  SIDS (2002) concluded "it is a very mild skin irritation substance", therefore, it was classified as Category 3.

skin_sensitizer.hazard_statement: May cause an allergic skin reaction
skin_sensitizer.rationale: Skin sensitization is acknowledged in the human maximization test results and in the epidemiological research for occupational exposure (SIDS, 2002), moreover, it is published as a surface sensitization in the Japanese Society of Occupational Allergy list. Therefore, we classified it as Category 1.

substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.hazard_name: Substances and mixtures which, in contact with water, emit flammable gases
substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.rationale: The chemical structure of the substance does not contain metals or metaloids(B, Si, P, Ge, As, Se, Sn, Sb, Te, Bi, Po, At).

systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organ toxicity - Repeated exposure
systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.rationale: Classification not possible due to lack of data

systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organ toxicity - Single exposure
systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.hazard_statement: May cause respiratory irritation (respiratory tract irritation)
systemic_toxicity_single_exposure.rationale: Classified as Category 3 (respiratory irritant), based on the information that it has irritation to nose and throat in humans (ACGIH, 2001).
